document_data.name: Mauza Dalidasis
document_data.mainbody: '''Mauza Dalidasis''' was an innkeeper inhabiting [[Kadarasto]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}{{cite book/Ruined Kingdoms/Campaign Guide|22}}
document_data.Personality: Mauza was charming and personableâ€”truly rare traits for the citizens of the "City Most Sinister."
document_data.Activities: Mauza owned [[the Broken Wheel]] inn which, aside from the [[caravanserai]] found outside the city gates, was one of a few reputable places to rent a room in the entire city. She was a valuable source of information for anyone willing to spend the coin.
document_data.Relationships: Mauzo was married to [[Cholk min Kado]] who owned [[the Shop of Faded Carpets]].
